songs.title: Fly With Me
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Nick Jonas]
If time was still
The sun would never, never find us
We could light up
The sky, tonight
I, could see the world through your eyes
Leave it all behind

[Chorus: Nick Jonas]
If it's you and me forever
If it's you and me right now
That'd be alright
Be alright
If we chase the stars to lose our shadow
Peter Pan and Wendy turned out fine
So won't you fly with me?
Oh, yeah
Gotta fly with me now

[Verse 2: Nick Jonas]
Now, the past
Has come
And I've been given meaning
And a reason
To give, all I can
To believe, once again

[Chorus: Nick & Joe Jonas]
If it's you and me forever
If it's you and me right now
That'd be alright
Be alright
If we chase the stars to lose our shadow
Peter Pan and Wendy turned out fine
So, won't you fly with me?

[Bridge: Nick Jonas]
Maybe you were just afraid
Knowing you were miles away
From the place where you needed to be
And that's right here with me

[Breakdown: Nick Jonas]
It's you and me forever
You and me right now
I'd be alright
If we chase the stars to lose our shadow
Peter Pan and Wendy turned out fine
So, won't you fly with me?

[Chorus: Nick Jonas & Joe Jonas]
If it's you and me forever
If it's you and me right now
I'd be alright
Be alright
If we chase the stars to lose our shadow
Peter Pan and Wendy turned out fine
So won't you fly

[Outro]
Fly
Fly, with me?
